entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:52 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 5:28 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries or rain showers beginning in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
